pageTitle: Crushing the Crown - Quest - World of Warcraft
textBeforeTable: In order to unlock this daily, you must first complete the following quest chain: Love Tokens per day Comment by jjanchan Crushing the Crown - Grants 5 Comment by Docther Take some time to grind the area, mobs are worth way more exp and they respawn very quickly. Comment by Emzor Any idea how close you have to be to the wagon to throw the bomb? Comment by shockoo88 THANK U ARTHEMIS FOR THE HELP AND YES IT IS RIGHT NEXT TO CENARION THICKET CAMP the location 40 15 Comment by kaguraa in orgrimar the wagon its outside on the right Location: 40.7 3.8 submitted a pic Comment by arthemis Go Right Outside of Shattrath City Exit, by Going East like if your heading near.... Cenarion Thicket Camp to your left from the walking path. The chemical Wagon and the Crown Underling are there...Can't Miss em. Comment by Damianoxo The wagon is at 41, 22.
